version_description:
Hypersquad, we have a new update for you today. Remember to tag your creations #hyperspektiv so we can follow along. Much more coming soon.

• VJ Mode is here. You can now seamlessly run real-time visuals straight out of your phone — connect to a display via AirPlay or HDMI, enable mirroring, go wild. Full detailed instructions at hyperspektiv.com/support.
• Now compatible with iOS 9.0.
• Bug fixes.

• Now compatible with iOS 9.0.
• Bug fixes.

Hypersquad, we have a new update for you today. Remember to tag your creations #hyperspektiv so we can follow along. Much more coming soon.

• VJ Mode is here. You can now seamlessly run real-time visuals straight out of your phone — connect to a display via AirPlay or HDMI, enable mirroring, go wild. Full detailed instructions at hyperspektiv.com/support.
• Now compatible with iOS 9.0.
• Bug fixes.

Hypersquad - Welcome to the 2.5 update! Deep energy went into this one - we are so excited to share it with all of you!

—AR Body Detection

With the latest iPhones (NOTE: iPhone XR and newer only) you can now isolate and apply filters to a person or their background in real-time. Point your camera at someone (or yourself) and tap the glowing ‘Body Recognition’ button in the top left of the screen. This is an *experimental* feature that adds much creative potential, we can’t wait to see what you create! NOTE: Body Recognition currently only works in live-capture and runs on these ARKit 3-enabled devices: iPhone XR, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max and iPad Pro (running iOS 13).

—Photo to Video

You can now instantly turn photos into videos! Try opening a photo from your Camera Roll and simply hold down the capture button to save a video. If you want to create a still photo simply toggle into “Still” mode.

—Full HD (4k and above) Export

For our subscribers - imported photos and videos will now export at their native resolutions. That means you can get 4k (and above!) output from Hyperspektiv! We fixed a limitation in the 2.0 engine that was keeping the max output at 1080p. For our free users - you get HD as well! It will be limited to 1080p.

—60 FPS Live Capture

On newer devices, enjoy our complimentary update from 30fps to 60fps.

-One new free filter: SPECTRUM
-Two new Premium filters: DOMA and POLLEN.
-Completely redesigned our graphics engine which should make things run faster and smoother as well as tons of bug fixes.

2.5 is a major upgrade: Welcome to AR, HyperSquad!

2.5.2 is a patch update that makes our new "photo to video" mode clearer to understand and easier to use.

2.5.1

- Fixes a bug where video output was lower bitrate than it was supposed to be.

-One new free filter: SPECTRUM
-Two new Premium filters: DOMA and POLLEN.
-Completely redesigned our graphics engine which should make things run faster and smoother as well as tons of bug fixes.

- New Free Filter: GLIMMER
- New Premium Filter: REPETAE
- Solved an issue where saving imported videos could crash the app

- New Free Filter: GLIMMER
- New Premium Filter: REPETAE
- Solved an issue where saving imported videos could crash the app

- New Filters: ARROW, ROYGBIV
- More stability fixes for the engine. If you've been experiencing crashes, try this latest version!
If issues persist, contact us: support@hyperspektiv.com

- New Filters: ARROW, ROYGBIV
- More stability fixes for the engine. If you've been experiencing crashes, try this latest version!
If issues persist, contact us: support@hyperspektiv.com

- Fixes crashes in the H Menu

- Video import stability fixes

- Fixes crashes in the H Menu
- 2.5.5 introduced: Filters ARROW + ROYGBIV
- Video import stability fixes

- New free filter: SKETCHY
- 2 new premium filters: OBSIDIAN, BIRDSONG
- New icon and splash screen
- New sharing flow: easily share your creations to Instagram, Snapchat, or through the iOS share menu!

- New free filter: SKETCHY
- 2 new premium filters: OBSIDIAN, BIRDSONG
- New icon and splash screen
- New sharing flow: easily share your creations to Instagram, Snapchat, or through the iOS share menu!

- New FREE filter: NATURE. This one transforms anything green to new colors ... get outside and play with it!
- 2 new PREMIUM filters: CHEMICAL, FLUXUS
- Fixes a bug where disabling effects then enabling mirrors would re-enable effects
- Fixes a bug where taking photos under certain conditions would result in an all-white photo output

- New FREE filter: NATURE. This one transforms anything green to new colors ... get outside and play with it!
- 2 new PREMIUM filters: CHEMICAL, FLUXUS
- Fixes a bug where disabling effects then enabling mirrors would re-enable effects
- Fixes a bug where taking photos under certain conditions would result in an all-white photo output

- Bug fix: the previous update was causing issues with some subscriptions - fixed in this update.
please contact us at support@hyperspektiv.com if you are having trouble with your subscription.

Happy new year, we have a gift for you! We unlocked a ton of new free filters available to everyone.

We have some very exciting things in the works for 2021, but we wanted to take this opportunity to say thank you to the Hyperspektiv community. It’s our pleasure to create with you.

Don’t hesitate to reach out on email, Discord or Instagram DM

Happy new year, we have a gift for you! We unlocked a ton of new free filters available to everyone.

We have some very exciting things in the works for 2021, but we wanted to take this opportunity to say thank you to the Hyperspektiv community. It’s our pleasure to create with you.

Don’t hesitate to reach out on email, Discord or Instagram DM

New filters today! FUSCHIA and CYBER GHOST. CYBER GHOST requires AR and can produce some beautiful results using body detection. Thank you for following along, we are working on some very exciting updates. Get in touch on Discord or email us with any questions.

Today is a beautiful day because we have some new filters for you: HUXLEY and MUSHY. We hope you enjoy and can’t wait to see what you make with these.
